free: #e (Sakizaya people) did not ask for many things in the past.
#c 從前撒奇萊雅的生活不會要求很多事。
#e It was in this way that Sakizaya people lived with Amis in a tribe.
#c 撒奇萊雅人在部落跟阿美族一起生活，從前就這樣。
#n IU 9 中的nanay 為阿美語，根據上下文語意為「就」(好讓) 。
#e Sakizaya people’s food came from hunting and fishing, and (they) grew up many things.
#c 撒奇萊雅族人的食物是打獵來的，捕魚來的，還有種很多東西。
#e What the senior citizens wanted most was going to the mountain and hunting.
#c 老人家最想要的去山上打獵。
#n 根據轉注發音人(蔡宜庭)的說明，IU 17不合語法，mi-adup較好
#e (They) did not simply hunt.
#c 不是只有獵捕(動物)。
#e Sakizaya people hunt pigs.
#c 撒奇萊雅人獵捕豬隻。
#e (They) would shoot anything that would fly.
#c 會射會飛的東西。
#e Then (it) would be shot.
#c 於是就被打到。
#e (They) used traps and arrows to shoot all (animals) which walked on the ground.
#c 用捕獸器與弓箭射在地上走的所有動物。
#e Whenever (they) went to the mountain, (they) would carry rice, pickled pork and others.
#c 只要去山上就會揹著很多米、醃豬肉還有其他的。
#n sabak稻穀、belac食用米、panay糯米、tunuz 用糯米作成的麻糬。
#n anu...tu 表示「如果...的話」
#e (They) built up lodgings in the mountains.
#c 在山上蓋工寮。
#n dabek在撒奇萊雅語中的意思為非住家(luma’)的建築物，可以指集會所、工寮、雞舍等。
#e Sometimes (they) would stay for a long time.
#c 有時會待很久。
#e (They) stayed in the mountain for one week.
#c 在山上打獵一星期。
#n IU 37中的lipay為中文借字，漢字寫成禮拜
#e If (they) caught a big pig, (they) definitely killed (it).
#c 如果抓到大隻豬，一定在山上就殺好了。
#e If (they) carried it home, it was too far.
#c 如果抬回家，路途遙遠。
#e It was not good.
#c 這樣不好。
#e (They) thought that there were not many animals.
#c 心想獵物也不多。
#e (They) roasted the animals and then went home.
#c 把獵物都烤了才回家。
#n IU 50 與51中的mamin意思為全部。
#e What (they) brought home smelled good.
#c 拿回家的都很香。
#e The senior citizens’ lives were in that way.
#c 老人家的生活就是這樣。
#e The children at that time did not study.
#c 那時候小孩子都不讀書。
#e Unlike nowadays, (children) will study and compete.
#c 不像現在要讀書，互相競爭。
#n IU 63 中的masasu- 有「相互」的意思。
#e (They) did not study.
#c 所以不讀書。
#e (They) would follow the senior citizens to go to the mountain.
#c 跟著老人家去山上一次。
#e (They) were happy in the mountain.
#c 在山上心裡很高興。
#e (Children) followed the senior citizens to practice how to throw, shoot and play slingshot.
#c (小孩)跟著老人家練習如何丟、如何射箭、如何打彈弓。
#e Children would be watching the senior citizens.
#c 小孩子會一直看著老人家。
#e They were old and could not walk.
#c 他們老了走不動。
#e The children substituted for them.
#c 小孩子替代他們。
#n IU 80中的kuday為日語借字，漢字寫成交替(ko:tai)
#e (They) would hunt after they grew up.
#c 等(他們)長大之後才會打獵。
#e Not only Sakizaya people but also Amis and other indigenous people would go to the mountain.
#c 不是只有我們撒奇萊雅人，還有阿美族人以及其他的原住民都會到山上。
#n Amis a binacadan (阿美族原住民)。
#n IU 87 與88中的 mamin意思為全部。
#e There were many prey in the mountain.
#c 山上有很多獵物。
#n IU 89中的nawhani 南勢阿美語；撒奇萊雅語則為 zayhansa
#e Now our lives have changed.
#c 現在我們的生活已經改變了。
#n IU91的tu作為主題標記。
#e (We) could not hunt.
#c 不可以打獵。
#e (They) hunt many animals, roasted and took home.
#c 打到的獵物很多，也烤完了，要帶回家了。
#e (They) came down from the mountain.
#c 從山上下來。
